ygData.subject: Re: Places to get the heck out of 35?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... loot ... Being a ... Eh... Sometimes yes, sometimes no. The Ghost isnt what I d call a safe camp if there are people that don t know what they re doing
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:45 AM 12/8/99 -0800, you wrote:
>From: "Forsaken" <forsaken@...>
>
>One of the best places I went for Safe EXP was in the basement, hunting the
>Ghost in unrest. There is no chance of a train unless you make it and the
loot
>isn't too bad with jagged bands and DW boots being dropped occasionally.
Being a
>Cleric you are naturally in demand down there. Even at 35 you gain EXP pretty
>fast there ,depending on group make-up of course.

Eh...

Sometimes yes, sometimes no. The Ghost isnt what I'd call a safe camp if
there are people that don't know what they're doing down there. I was
playing my newbie up in Unrest, and after 4 basement trains getting dropped
on my head within an hour, I decided it was time to take Ily down to have a
talk with them. A cleric friend accompanied me, and taught them the proper
way to camp the ghost (I just did alot of yelling :))

Oddly, no more trains came out of the basement that night.

=Ilystil Drakonblayde <Emef`Aitch> / The Blade of Tunare
=Level 50 Lady Ranger of the Rathe / ilystil@...
===========================================================
'Ye have enemies? Good, good. That means ye've stood up
for something, sometime in they life.' - Elminster
